makeImage

void makeImage(java.lang.String configGroup,
               java.lang.String channel,
               double exposure,
               MicroscopeImageListener listener)
               throws MicroscopeException,
                      MicroscopeLockedException,
                      java.lang.InterruptedException
Makes an image with the given settings and sends it to the listener.

Parameters:
channel - The name of the channel.
configGroup - The config group representing the channels.
exposure - The exposure time
listener - The listener where the image should be send to.
Throws:
MicroscopeException
MicroscopeLockedException
java.lang.InterruptedException

startContinuousSequenceAcquisition

void startContinuousSequenceAcquisition(java.lang.String configGroup,
                                        java.lang.String channel,
                                        java.lang.String[] cameras,
                                        double[] exposures,
                                        int[] imagingPeriods)
                                        throws MicroscopeException,
                                               MicroscopeLockedException,
                                               java.lang.InterruptedException
Starts a continuous sequence acquisition with the given cameras in parallel.

Parameters:
channel - The name of the channel.
imagingPeriods - The intervals with which the images should be made.
configGroup - The config group representing the channels.
exposures - The exposure times of the cameras.
cameras - The cameras.
listener - The listener where the image should be send to.
Throws:
MicroscopeException
MicroscopeLockedException
java.lang.InterruptedException

continousSequenceAcquisitionPopNextImage

boolean continousSequenceAcquisitionPopNextImage(MicroscopeImageListener listener)
                                                 throws MicroscopeException,
                                                        MicroscopeLockedException,
                                                        java.lang.InterruptedException
Pops an image in the previously started continuous acquisition and sends it to the listener. If no image is available, no image will be send to the listener.

Parameters:
listener - The listener where the image should be send to.
Returns:
TRUE if an image was available, false otherwise.
Throws:
MicroscopeException
MicroscopeLockedException
java.lang.InterruptedException

makeComposedImages

void makeComposedImages(java.lang.String configGroup,
                        java.lang.String channel,
                        double exposure,
                        MicroscopeImageListener listener,
                        ComposedImagePosition[] positions)
                        throws MicroscopeLockedException,
                               MicroscopeException,
                               java.lang.InterruptedException
Makes the images of a composed image at the given positions.

Parameters:
configGroup - The config group representing the channels.
channel - Channel to make the composed image in.
exposure - Exposure for every image.
listener - Listener to send the images to.
positions - Position information for the single images.
Throws:
MicroscopeLockedException
MicroscopeException
java.lang.InterruptedException
